name: White Pen Road
description:
The action game where you draw lines in the air!
The player can move and jump.
You can draw lines in the air with the mouse.
The lines you draw become scaffolding.

----- Controls -----

< Menu >

* Mouse Cursor or Arrow Keys or WASD - Select
* Mouse Click or [Space] or [Enter] or [Z] - Confirm
* [Escape] or [Backspace] or [X] - Back

< Game >

* Arrow Keys or WASD - Move Player, Jump Player
* Mouse Drag - Draw a line
* [P] or [Space] - Pause
* [R] - Retry
